channel.title: SevenAtSevenPolitics
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from SevenAtSevenPolitics, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: US-Japan trade deal gives Trump control over $550 billion in investments. It could be ‘vapor ware’ — and a model for other countries
item.description: Analysts at Bank of America said that the Japan deal "looks like a reasonable blueprint" for other auto-exporting countries like South Korea.

item.title: Trump calls for immediate ceasefire between Cambodia and Thailand amid escalating violence
item.description: President Trump called for a ceasefire as the border conflict between Cambodia and Thailand enters its third day with both nations blaming each other.

item.title: Trump links Thailand, Cambodia trade deals to ceasefire
item.description: President Trump on Saturday said no trade deals would be struck with Thailand and Cambodia until they cease fighting.

item.title: Paramount, Skydance merger set for August; deal worth $8 billion
item.description: Paramount Global and Skydance Media announced Friday that their merger will take place next month, barring any issues with the $8 billion deal.

item.title: The Tea app was intended to help women date safely. Then hackers leaked 72,000 images online, including users’ selfies
item.description: No email addresses or phone numbers were exposed, the company said, and the breach only affects users who signed up before February 2024.

item.title: Allianz Life says hackers accessed personal data on the majority of its 1.4 million US customers
item.description: Allianz Life said the data breach happened on July 16 when a “malicious threat actor” accesses a third-party, cloud-based system used by the company.
